title: Masala Omelette
description: A quick, protein-packed Indian-style omelette with onions, chili, and spices. Perfect for breakfast or a lazy dinner.
instructions: Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and turmeric.
Add chopped onions, green chili, and coriander leaves. Mix well.
Heat oil in a pan, pour the mixture, and cook on medium heat for 2-3 minutes.
Flip and cook the other side until golden. Serve with bread or roti.

title: Simple Tadka Dal
description: A comforting lentil dish with a flavorful tempering of cumin, garlic, and chili. Pairs perfectly with rice or roti.
instructions: Rinse lentils and cook in 2 cups water with turmeric until soft (15-20 mins).
Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin, garlic, and red chili. Sauté until fragrant.
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy.
Mix the tempering into the cooked lentils. Simmer for 5 mins. Serve hot.

title: Spiced Scrambled Eggs (Egg Bhurji)
description: A fiery scrambled egg dish with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Ready in 10 minutes!
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Sauté onions and green chili until translucent.
Add tomatoes and spices. Cook until soft.
Beat eggs in a bowl and pour into the pan.
Scramble until fully cooked. Garnish with coriander leaves.

title: Bachelor's Chicken Curry
description: A one-pot chicken curry with minimal spices and maximum flavor. Ideal for beginners!
instructions: Marinate chicken with turmeric, chili powder, and salt for 10 mins.
Heat oil in a pot. Sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 mins.
Add tomatoes and spices. Cook until oil separates.
Add chicken and 1 cup water. Simmer for 25-30 mins. Serve with rice.
